title: Glossy Classic Watch Face
summary: Timeless classic on your wrist. Customizable elegant watch face. Useful widgets.
description: Glossy Classic -  stylish and elegant interactive analog watch face for your Android Wear device. Timeless classic design and multiple customization features allow to create number of great looking watch faces according to your taste. Works on Moto 360,Moto 360-2, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch and other Wear devices. Looks great on both round and square displays. Key features:✔ Interactive Watch Face✔ Option to move clock hands over widgets or move it back again (Tap on "6")✔ Date✔ Day of the week.✔ Digital time.✔ Watch battery level.✔ Phone battery level.✔ Stopwatch✔ Timer✔ Unread SMS and Missed calls✔ Heart rate✔ Temperature (Celcius/Fahrenheit)✔ Weather icon.✔ Weather forecast for 3 days.✔ Step counter synchronized with your watch embedded pedometer .✔ Smooth seconds.✔ Selected theme in ambient mode.✔ Colors and widgets customization directly on smart watchSettings:✔ Enable/disable of using selected theme in ambient mode.✔ Select weather update period✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)✔ Select distance unit (steps,km,miles)✔ Select color for seconds hand✔ Select color for clock ticksTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose  Glossy Classic Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.Common Synchronization problem & solution.If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'- uninstall the watch face- disconnect watch from phone- restart your watch device- reconnect watch and phone- install the Glossy Classic watch face once againIn case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
descriptionHTML:
Glossy Classic - stylish and elegant interactive analog watch face for your Android Wear device. Timeless classic design and multiple customization features allow to create number of great looking watch faces according to your taste.
Works on Moto 360,Moto 360-2, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch and other Wear devices. Looks great on both round and square displays.

Key features:
✔ Interactive Watch Face
✔ Option to move clock hands over widgets or move it back again (Tap on "6")
✔ Date
✔ Day of the week.
✔ Digital time.
✔ Watch battery level.
✔ Phone battery level.
✔ Stopwatch
✔ Timer
✔ Unread SMS and Missed calls
✔ Heart rate
✔ Temperature (Celcius/Fahrenheit)
✔ Weather icon.
✔ Weather forecast for 3 days.
✔ Step counter synchronized with your watch embedded pedometer .
✔ Smooth seconds.
✔ Selected theme in ambient mode.
✔ Colors and widgets customization directly on smart watch


Settings:
✔ Enable/disable of using selected theme in ambient mode.
✔ Select weather update period
✔ Select temperature unit (Fahrenheit,Celsius)
✔ Select distance unit (steps,km,miles)
✔ Select color for seconds hand
✔ Select color for clock ticks


To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Glossy Classic Watch Face as your watch face. To change the watch face theme please tap the watch face icon in Android Wear app and select theme.

Sometimes there's a delay getting the watch face on the watch from your phone, please don't worry and wait up to 10 minutes. This is not caused by the watch face, but Bluetooth LE has limited upload speed.

Common Synchronization problem & solution.
If the App doesn't appear on your watch please do the following:
- make sure the app is successfully downloaded and installed on your phone. Check 'Applications Manager'
- uninstall the watch face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart your watch device
- reconnect watch and phone
- install the Glossy Classic watch face once again

In case of any problem, please don’t rate it 1-star, contact us on alex@alexgalkin.com and give us maximum 24 hours to solve that.
comments: I like it but... When are y'all adding the silver face instead of jus the black face only?
Design looks pretty good. It did end up installing after the last update.

Dear Alex,  I purchased Glossy Classic Watch Face yesterday. However, I can't see this face in my Android wear app in phone, sothat I can't sync with my watch (Moto 360 gen1, 6.0 version). I have tried many way, included your instruction in Playstore. At the moment, It's still not OK.  Please help me soon.   addition information :   Phone : Galaxy S5 Prime, android wear lastest version Watch : Moto 360 gen 1, massmellow 6.0 version.
Wrong weather info In old versions weather info is correct and now is wrong.
This is my favorite watch face for my Moto 360 1st gen.  Nice appearance, easy to see, good interactive features.
Too Limited and Doesn't Scale Not enough color options and it doesn't scale up on the new Moto 360 v2, so it's small and shrunk looking .
recentChanges: ✔ Digital time/Steps info available under the date
✔ Fixed issue with disappearing of some items after switching from another watch face.
✔ Improved compatibility with Moto 360-2 and Huawei Watch
✔ Added option to move clock hands over widgets or move it back again (Tap on "6")
